document_name: Disaster Loss Database Establishment in the Republic of Serbia
Capacity Development Programme for Conventional Ammunition Stockpile Management for the Republic of Serbia (CASM)
Support for gender mainstreaming in policing practice in South Eastern Europe
Strengthening of Regional Cooperation on Gender Mainstreaming in Security Sector Reform in the Western Balkans

outputs.output_descr:
Phase I)
Expected Outcome:	
Improved arms control through increased national capacities and regional cooperation
Expected Outputs:	
Output 1: 
Establishment of regional arms exports information exchange process 
Output 2: 
Increased capacity for parliamentary oversight of arms exports in the Western Balkans

Phase II) Expected outcome: Improved controls over brokering, post-export controls, as well as further enhancement of transparency, knowledge and information sharing.
Output 1:
Increased Transparency of Arms Transfers
Output 2: 
Improved capacity to control the arms trade
Output 3:
Enhanced regional information exchange and knowledge sharing

Output 1
MoD Gender Focal Points institutionalization and capacity development supported
Output 2
Human Resource policy reform to improve recruitment and retention of women personnel supported
Output 3 
Gender sensitization programme developed and implemented

Output 1:
Improved Security of SALW and ammunition stockpiles 

Output 2: 
SALW and Ammunition stockpiles reduced 

Output 3:
Marking, tracing and registration of SALW improved

Output 4:
Increased regional cooperation on knowledge and information sharing and awareness raising

Output 5:
Illicit possession of SALW and Ammunition reduced

Output 1: 
Improved management and security of unsafe and unstable stockpiles of weapons and ammunition

Output 2: 
Reduction of the available stockpiles of weapons and ammunition

Output 3:
Increased controls on SALW through marking, tracing and registration of weapons

Expected CP Outcome(s):		
Increased gender awareness and improved gender responsiveness of policing practice in SEE
Expected Output(s):		
Output 1:
Awareness Raising on the Position of Women in Police Forces in SEE and Women's Human Rights 
Output 2:
Capacity Development for Gender Responsive Policing Practice in SEE 
Output 3:
Replication of the Regional Network at the National Level
Increased harmonization of the SALW legislation and its implementation in the Western Balkans countries with the legislation and practices in the European Union

project_descr: The South Eastern and Eastern Europe Clearinghouse for the Control of Small Arms and Light Weapons (SEESAC)  2009-2015
